title: Good value for money
text: I would probably rate this restaurant a 3.5/5. The concept is brilliant and for £29 the dishes were of good value. I was a little disappointed that two of the meals were not warm enough (room temperature), and the pasta course was rather tasteless. The lemon tart was my favourite.

title: Great Bar
text: Three of us visited this bar on a Saturday night. The drinks were really nice and the table service was great. The venue itself has a lovely atmosphere to it with a great playlist playing in the background and pretty lighting.

title: Nice food and friendly service
text: I would probably rate this a 3.5/5. I had a meal here on a Saturday night with two friends. The lady working as front of house was very friendly and informative. The food was also really nice, but we were disappointed with how spaced out in time the different dishes were. I understand that all dishes won't come together, but there was a 1 hour difference between when the first and last dish arrived (we were only a table of 3). I've not had this issue when visiting Maray on the Docks.

title: Great place
text: This restaurant was right next to our hotel and we ended up visiting it 3 times during our 1 week stay in NYC (once for dinner and twice for drinks and a small bite to eat during the daytime). The main thing that stood out to us was how welcoming the staff were. We also enjoyed the relaxed vibe of the restaurant. The food was really tasty and I had the best dessert I've ever had here. I can't remember its name but I've uploaded a picture :)

title: Very happy with our stay :)
text:
Staff were welcoming, room was clean, location was great, bed was comfortable and we slept well. So overall very happy with our stay.

There was no safety box in the room but there are some available at reception.
There is no lift and we had heavy suitcases. It didn't really bother us though as we knew this in advance.

title: Very happy with our stay :)
text: The hotel was modern and the staff were friendly. The room was super clean (first hotel I have been to that has zero dust in drawers and shelves in the wardrobe). The view from the roof top is surprising good, especially as the sun sets. The location as perfect, and i definitely recommend going for a meal/drinks two doors down to Tomino Taberna Gallega.

title: Beautiful walk
text: It was the first time I've done this walk. It took me just over 2 hours and the walk itself is not hard. The views are beautiful.

title: Nice meal and very friendly staff
text: This was our second visit to this restaurant. The food was tasty and the waitress that served us was very friendly and welcoming. All tables were nicely spaced out.

title: Beautiful place
text: This is such a beautiful part of Corfu and should not be missed. It's particularly picturesque around the time the sun sets. Plus it's right in the town centre so you can then go visit the romantic narrow alleys of the town and go for a drink.

title: Lovely meal with beautiful view
text: If you want tasty traditional Greek food with a beautiful view this is the place to be. I recommend getting there before the sun sets so you can enjoy the view.

title: Nice bar with nice drinks
text: This is a nice bar with a relaxing vibe to it located right by the beach. The cocktails are really nice and I would definitely go again.

title: Tasty crepes
text: This is a nice relaxed place that serves both sweet and savoury snacks e.g. crepes, waffles, club sandwiches etc. I had both a sweet and savoury crepe and they were both really tasty.

title: Greek fast food at its best!
text: If you're looking for Greek fast food this is the place to go. The pittas are really tasty and filling. There's a couple of tables outside to sit at as well as 2-3 tables inside upstairs.

title: Amazing
text: Make sure you visit this historic site if you are in Athens (wear comfortable shoes). It's an amazing part of Greek history and the views of the city are also wonderful.

title: Fun day out :)
text: My husband and I spent around 3 hours here on a sunny day. It was busy as it was on a weekend, but not so busy that we could not enjoy it. It's a fun day both for adults and children.

title: Coffee and cake with a view
text: Stopped here with some friends after a long walk around Llangollen. Only had a coffee and cake but they were tasty, and we sat at a nice table outside in the sun. The cafe also had gluten free cake options.

title: Lovely meal
text: My husband and I had a lovely meal here. The food is good and the service is excellent. The restaurant had a nice relaxed atmosphere to it.

title: Really glad I visited
text: This is such an educational and interesting tour. The tour guide was extremely knowledgeable and friendly. I strongly recommend a visit.

title: Breakfast in Dublin
text: My husband and I were looking for a place for breakfast and came across this place. We were very happy with our experience here. The food was tasty and freshly made cakes were available each day. The staff were also really nice and friendly.

title: Great hotel with perfect location
text: My husband and I spent 3 nights here. The hotel is lovely, with nice sized rooms and is super clean. We were also offered fresh cookies on arrival which was a nice touch. We also visited the hotel bar for a few drinks which had a nice atmosphere to it.
place: The Morrison, a DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel

title: Beautiful building
text: This is a beautiful building to visit, especially during December due to all the decorations. A small donation can be made on entry but is not mandatory. Sometimes you can also catch a glimpse of a choir or orchestra rehearsing, which adds a magical vibe to the experience.

title: Nice day out
text: This is my third visit to Chester zoo. It is a little pricey, but by there is a large variety of animals and you can easily spend 3-4 hours here. It is a great day out for people of all ages all year round.

title: Lovely meal
text: This is one of my favourite restaurants. The food is of great quality and value; I particularly love the cheesecake. Only slight negative is that out of our 3 visits to this restaurant, twice the service has been a little slow. This was not an issue to us as we were not in a rush.

title: Unique bar
text: I really like this little bar. It is tricky to find but worth the effort. When you enter you feel like you have gone back in time. The service is good and the drinks are excellent. They also offer a few bar nibbles.

title: 2 night stay
text: This is a lovely modern hotel but is rather expensive. We stayed here on our wedding night and wedding eve. We stayed in one of the penthouse suites which had a great view of the city. We also ordered breakfast to our room which was a nice touch.

title: My favourite restaurant in Liverpool
text: I love this place so much that my husband and I decided to hold our wedding here. The staff were amazing and the food was excellent.

title: Lovely meal
text: This was our second visit to this restaurant. The food was tasty and the staff were welcoming. I would recommend this place :)

title: Amazing dining experience
text: This was our second visit to this restaurant. The food is lovely, the service is excellent, and we felt very COVID safe. The meals are nicely spaced out which made us feel relaxed and allowed us to enjoy our time there.

title: My favourite place in Durham
text: The cathedral is absolutely beautiful; we saw it both in the daytime and at night. I’ll let the pictures speak for themselves

title: 2 night stay at the Lakes
text: There was nothing wrong with the hotel, but for what we paid I would say the value is average. The room was clean, but both my husband and I felt like the room didn’t resemble the online hotel pictures. We staid in room 28 and it was nowhere near as modern as the pictures suggested online. Breakfast was tasty and good portion sizes, but was disappointed when I asked if there was any fruit and they said they didn’t have any.

title: One night stay in York
text: The hotel was beautiful, the staff were very welcoming, and we felt very COVID safe. Our room was very clean, very spacious, and masks/hand sanitiser were provided in each room. We did not have breakfast at the hotel but did visit the hotel bar. The drinks were nicely made, service was great and the bar had a nice relaxed atmosphere to it.

title: Great brownies
text: I walked past with my husband and could smell the brownies so we couldn't help ourselves. Only had a brownie but it was fresh and delicious :)

title: OK food, but I would not return
text: The food tasted ok and the staff were relatively friendly, but unfortunately there were a few things I was not happy with. Firstly, our burger and pizza arrived 6 minutes after ordering which to me implies the food is not as fresh as it should be. Secondly, all the waitresses were wearing their masks below their nose. Finally, whilst in the bathroom I saw a waitress walk out of a cubicle and exiting the ladies without washing her hands.

title: One night stay in Durham
text: Amazing location, friendly staff, modern hotel. Our room was a little small, but it was clean and had all the amenities we needed. The hotel also offers parking. The only thing I was disappointed with was breakfast; it was very average.

title: Great brunch in Durham
text: My husband and I visited Flat White Kitchen mid-week for brunch; we were not disappointed. The food is so tasty, and this place has the best pancakes I have ever had. All staff were wearing masks and customers had to until they were sat at their table. The service was a little slow but we were not in a rush and we were made to feel welcome.

title: Romantic Meal
text: Had a lovely meal here mid-week. The service was excellent and the food lovely. Good precautions were also in place for COVID-19. The only reason am scoring this a 4 rather than a 5 is because unfortunately the coconut & white chocolate parfait had no flavour to it (I think it was stored in a fridge that was too cold as the texture felt a little frozen, and this might have affected the flavour). I would definitely visit again though

title: Great vegetarian dining experience
text: This was my first visit to a vegetarian/vegan restaurant and all meals were super tasty and beautifully presented. The staff were friendly and welcoming, and the service was great. Good precautions were also in place for COVID-19.

title: Lovely meal
text: Lovely food and great service. Each course was nicely spaced out to create a relaxed atmosphere. Could not fault it.
